issue.title: [Java] Remove redundant code for Jdbc adapters
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7166](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7166). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5508#issuecomment-543011016, we need a separate issue to extract common logic to a common super class. 

This makes the code clearer, and we need to make sure we have no performance regression.
